DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Will spend 1 bar (33%) of Meter to apply this additional effect.
Draw 1 kard and gain 1 [E] but deal 10% less damage for the rest of this turn.
When attacked this creature will take additional damage. Lasts until the end of the round.
Kombo kards must be played after regular attack kards. (Unless specified.)
Mixup damage is 200% effective against Block.
Creature will deal less damage, the amount is halved after each of it's attacks.
If you follow this Kard with a #bSpecial, it will cost #b1 less [E] .
